snippet: Law enforcement officials were helped by Facebook, whose users were among those targeted by the software employed by cybercriminals in the last few years.
abstract: International authorities, with some help from Facebook, arrest 10 people accused of operating network of infected computers that stole personal information from 11 million computers of victims over past few years, and caused more than $850 million in losses.

byline.original: By BRIAN X. CHEN and JOHN H. CUSHMAN Jr

lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials were helped by Facebook, whose users were among those targeted by the software employed by cybercriminals in the last few years.

headline.seo: 10 Arrested in Theft of Personal Data
headline.main: 10 Arrested in Theft of Web Data
headline.print_headline: 10 Arrested In Theft Of Web Data
